I'll RP the cats for a while Ryo, but I really don't think you should 
let me do it. I have my own chars in this conflict as well.

::Killfest::

Killfest shruggs. "I'll do it. Some variety to battle wouldn't be too 
bad."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Hah" Motormaster belows, "They've come to meet their doom." 
looking to his
> two allies he speaks again, "Any of you joy riders want to try 
riding
> Astroblast?" he says, pressing a button on the wall of Astroblast 
to open
> the hatch.
